dmca.title: [EV1-C1716555C] Copyright Infringement Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 12:23 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1716555C] Copyright Infringement Notification
Subject: [EV1-C1716555C] Copyright Infringement Notification

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1 
 
Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
since the domain/host r3lax.nl resolves to the IP address 70.85.236.34,
which lies within a range of IP addresses assigned to you, I'd herewith
like to point your attention to this above-mentioned server which is
[partially] used for distributing copyrighted material of adult nature
(full sized images/galleries) owned by Crush Studios, US,
(http://www.crushphoto.com), that is not intended for being made
publicly available on the Internet, and which therefore constitutes a
severe infringement of copyright. 
 
I.e.: 
 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1023&highlight=crushphoto 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1061&highlight=crushphoto 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1027&highlight=crushphoto 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1026&highlight=crushphoto 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1025&highlight=crushphoto 
http://r3lax.nl/viewtopic.php?t=1024&highlight=crushphoto 
 
These threads/posts do *not* contain preview or promotional pictures 
which are for the limited purpose of being freely accessible on the 
Internet. Instead, these threads/posts contain indices of and links 
to almost complete gallery sets and images from www.crushphoto.com 
without the latter's explicit permission. 
- - 
I hope that the information provided might be helpful as regards 
tracking down any illegal activities, speaking of which I would like to 
kindly ask you to take immediate action(s) against this kind of 
copyright infringement. 
 
Thank you for your attention. 
Yours sincerely, 
 
- --  
Sven Ottoson 
e-mail: sottoson@unixnode.org 
OpenPGP Key ID: 0x7247B172
